item.title: Wild back?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:25, topic:226438”]You must’ve played a shit load in those six months.

Anyways, who cares? It’s over. It’s not going to come back for obvious reasons (RWT being a major factor). The new upcoming PVP worlds will definitely be entertaining, and in a sense they’ll be more fun than the wilderness was. Sure, it wont be the same, and we know that. But instead of greiving over the past, try dealing with the current.[/quote]Nah, botted mostly.

[quote=“exe626, post:24, topic:226438”]i sold all my pures, i cba to rebuild a new.

-6 months
+600$
:/[/quote]You must’ve played a shit load in those six months.

Anyways, who cares? It’s over. It’s not going to come back for obvious reasons (RWT being a major factor). The new upcoming PVP worlds will definitely be entertaining, and in a sense they’ll be more fun than the wilderness was. Sure, it wont be the same, and we know that. But instead of greiving over the past, try dealing with the current.

item.title: Wild back?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Who cares? It gives me the shits knowing that so many of the people who make up the Runescape player base are completely incapable of making the smallest compromise to achieve something desirable that meets the requirements of Jagex as well.

No, it won’t be the same. However you can bet that the new pvp worlds will be quite entertaining, probably more so than the old pvp area which was plagued with people who didn’t actually want to take part in pvp activities.

item.title: Wild back?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

You’re right.

STFU talking about P servers. Go to MS if you want to chat shit. It’s runescape, where you can attack other players anywhere apart from banks and other safe spots(I presume). REALLY looking forward to this update. Gives me a reason to keep my main level 70 def. I hope it’s a bit like the wildy where there are restrictions on what levels you can attack, otherwise it could be stupid.

item.title: Wild back?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Nope, it’s still essentially a private server. A runescape world where the normal rules of runescape don’t apply. A jagex owned and maintained private server.

They can then entice people away from private servers, and at the same time improve their case for civil action against anyone running a private server. Their creating the market your already stealing from by providing the service you already provide.

Anyway who cares.

Read full topic

item.title: Wild back?

item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

[quote=“Rog3r, post:3, topic:226438”]Lol, oh well…

Anyways yes this is a good idea, but the world would be a safe haven, pretty much for mining or woodcutting afar, with people focusing on fighting, you can get up your skills without anyone near you (unless they follow you or find you)

But the world will perhaps be pretty dull, not many people around as the high levels will be all there, and the noobs will be left out on the other worlds.[/quote]So your saying I have to go to PKing worlds…?

item.title: Wild back?
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Lol, oh well…

Anyways yes this is a good idea, but the world would be a safe haven, pretty much for mining or woodcutting afar, with people focusing on fighting, you can get up your skills without anyone near you (unless they follow you or find you)

But the world will perhaps be pretty dull, not many people around as the high levels will be all there, and the noobs will be left out on the other worlds.

Read full topic
